#summary General Usage of WLM.

= Introduction =


First the script has to be made executable: chmod +x wlm






WLM can be used in 2 ways ; 

*To list all possible permutations of a (single) word using Gitsnik's permute.pl script

*Alter a wordlist following the options as seen in the options menu.
